scripts.version-patch: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const [major,minor,patch]=pkg.version.split('.').map(Number); pkg.version=\`\${major}.\${minor}.\${patch+1}\`; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\\n')" && git add package.json && git commit -m "bump @playhtml/common to v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag @playhtml/common-v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")
scripts.version-minor: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const [major,minor]=pkg.version.split('.').map(Number); pkg.version=\`\${major}.\${minor+1}.0\`; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\\n')" && git add package.json && git commit -m "bump @playhtml/common to v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag @playhtml/common-v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")
scripts.version-major: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const [major]=pkg.version.split('.').map(Number); pkg.version=\`\${major+1}.0.0\`; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\\n')" && git add package.json && git commit -m "bump @playhtml/common to v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag @playhtml/common-v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")
scripts.release-patch: bun run version-patch && bun run publish-only
scripts.release-minor: bun run version-minor && bun run publish-only
scripts.release-major: bun run version-major && bun run publish-only
